subtitle: This is a very colourful and tasty dish that can be served hot or cold.

method.text: Heat oil and fry aubergine and garlic until soft. Add courgettes and cook for 2-3 min. Stir in chopped tomatoes and herbs. Bring to the boil and simmer for 15-20 min until vegetables are cooked - add a little water if consistency becomes very dry.
Stir in fresh single cream. Season to taste. Heat through. Transfer to a gratin dish. Sprinkle with the cheese.
Place under a hot grill to melt and brown cheese. Sprinkle with chopped parsley.

title: Mediterranean gratin
